TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookieCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookieCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供用于操作 HTTP cookie 的类型安全方式。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to manipulate HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象的属性读取 cookie ，并使用对象的属性写入 cookie 。The following code example demonstrates how to read cookies using the property of the object and write cookies using the property of the object. 这两个属性都返回 对象。Both properties return objects. 如果两个 cookie 中有一个名为 `userName` 且 `lastVisit` 不在 http 请求中，则会在 http 响应中创建它们。If either of two cookies named `userName` and `lastVisit` are not in the HTTP request, then they are created in the HTTP response. 如果两个 cookie 存在，则会显示 cookie 的属性。If the two cookies exist, the properties of the cookies are displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/cs/HttpCookieCollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/vb/HttpCookieCollection.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 可通过的集合 包含客户端在标头中传输到服务器的 cookie `Cookie` 。The collection accessible through contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 可通过的集合 包含在服务器上生成并在标头中传输到客户端的 cookie `Set-Cookie` 。The collection accessible through contains cookies generated on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 cookie 集合对象，并使用从客户端收到的 cookie 来填充它。The following example creates a new cookie collection object and fills it with the cookies received from the client. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 Cookie 添加到此 Cookie 集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified cookie to the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序中可以存在任意数量的 cookie 集合，但仅将内部对象引用的集合 发送到客户端。Any number of cookie collections can exist within an application, but only the collection referenced by the intrinsic object is sent to the client. 方法允许 cookie 集合中存在重复的 cookie。The method allows duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 使用 方法可确保 cookie 集合中 cookie 的唯一性。Use the method to ensure the uniqueness of cookies in the cookie collection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 cookie 集合和一个名为 "LastVisit" 的新 cookie，将该 cookie 的值设置为当前日期和时间，并将该 cookie 添加到新集合中。The following example creates a new cookie collection and a new cookie named "LastVisit", sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and adds the cookie to the new collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个字符串数组，该数组包含此 Cookie 集合中的所有键（Cookie 名称）。

span.span: Gets a string array containing all the keys (cookie names) in the cookie collection.
An array of cookie names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个字符串数组，其中包含客户端的 cookie 集合中的 cookie 的名称。The following example creates a string array containing the names of the cookies in a client's cookie collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of cookies by either name or numerical index.

span.span: Returns the item with the specified index from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例从 cookie 集合中返回每个 cookie，检查其是否命名为 "LastVisit"，如果找到 "LastVisit"，则将其值更新为当前日期和时间。The following example returns each cookie from the cookie collection, checks whether it is named "LastVisit", and, if "LastVisit" is found, updates its value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the cookie to retrieve from the collection.

summary.span: 从 Cookie 集合中返回具有指定名称的 Cookie。

span.span: Returns the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的 cookie 不存在并且 cookie 集合为，则 此方法将使用该名称创建一个新的 cookie。If the named cookie does not exist and the cookie collection is , this method creates a new cookie with that name. ## Examples 下面的示例将客户端发送的 cookie 集合捕获到新的 cookie 集合，从新集合中检索名为 "LastVisit" 的 cookie，并将 cookie 的值更新为当前日期和时间。The following example captures the cookie collection sent by the client into a new cookie collection, retrieves the cookie named "LastVisit" from the new collection, and updates the cookie's value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `name` 集合中不存在具有指定的 cookie，则不会引发异常。If a cookie with the specified `name` does not exist in the collection, no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例从集合中删除 cookie。The following example removes a cookie from the collection. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Set(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The object to update.

summary.span: 更新 Cookie 集合中现有 Cookie 的值。

span.span: Updates the value of an existing cookie in a cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先检查 cookie 是否已存在于集合中，如果是，则更新它。The method first checks to see if a cookie already exists in the collection and if so updates it. 此 方法不允许 cookie 集合中存在重复的 cookie。The method does not allow duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 若要在 cookie 集合中添加重复 cookie，请使用 方法。To add duplicate cookies in the cookie collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例更新现有 cookie 的值。The following example updates the value of an existing cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
